description: This file defines an abstract base class 'ConnectorInterface' that specifies the interface for connector implementations in a software system. It declares several abstract methods for managing connections, searching resources, creating resources, listing projects, and handling connection lifecycle tasks. The class is intended to enforce a contract for all connector implementations.

classes.name: ConnectorInterface
classes.description: An abstract base class defining the interface for connectors, requiring implementation of methods for status checking, searching, creating resources, listing projects, deleting connections, and rotating connections.

methods.name: ConnectionStatus status(self, tenant_id: str)
methods.description: Returns the connection status for a given tenant.

methods.name: List[SearchResultItem] search(self, tenant_id: str, q: str, limit: int = 10, filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Performs a search for resources for a tenant with optional filters.

methods.name: CreateResult create(self, tenant_id: str, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a resource with a given payload at the provider.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] list_projects(self, tenant_id: str)
methods.description: Lists projects associated with the tenant.

methods.name: None delete_connection(self, tenant_id: str)
methods.description: Deletes or revokes the connection for the tenant.

methods.name: ConnectionStatus rotate_connection(self, tenant_id: str)
methods.description: Rotates tokens or refreshes connection for a tenant, returning the latest status.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^    def create(self, tenant_id: str, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> CreateResult:$/

ctags.name: list_projects
ctags.pattern: /^    def list_projects(self, tenant_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: search
ctags.pattern: /^    def search(self, tenant_id: str, q: str, limit: int = 10, filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] /
ctags.signature: (self, tenant_id: str, q: str, limit: int = 10, filters: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
